tool_description: Constructs detailed proposal outlines and section frameworks tailored to specific grant requirements and funder preferences, with content guidance.

grant_id.description: Grant opportunity identifier to build outline for

project_focus.description: Main focus area of the project

proposal_length.description: Expected proposal length category (short, medium, long)

writing_style.description: Preferred writing approach (academic, community-focused, technical, narrative)

error_messages: Grant not found: The specified grant_id does not exist or guidelines are unavailable.
Invalid proposal length: Must be one of 'short', 'medium', 'long'.
Invalid writing style: Must be one of 'academic', 'community-focused', 'technical', 'narrative'.
Outline generation failed: Unable to create proposal outline with provided parameters.
Missing grant requirements: Insufficient information about grant requirements to build outline.
usage: Provide grant_id and project_focus as required parameters. Optionally specify proposal_length and writing_style preferences. The tool returns structured proposal outline with section guidance and content recommendations.

outline_sections.description: Ordered list of main proposal sections

section_descriptions.description: Detailed descriptions of what to include in each section

page_allocations.description: Recommended page lengths for each section

key_elements.description: Critical elements that must be included based on grant requirements

writing_tips.description: Style and content tips for effective proposal writing

evaluation_alignment.description: How each section aligns with evaluation criteria
